meanings.definition: An enclosed area in which livestock are kept.
meanings.sent1: The farmer built a sturdy bawn to protect his sheep.
meanings.sent2: The cows grazed peacefully inside the wooden bawn.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous goat managed to escape the bawn and roam freely.
meanings.sent4: The bawn stood like a guardian around the farm animals.
meanings.sent5: Children loved to play near the bawn and watch the animals.

meanings.sent1: The ancient castle had a massive bawn surrounding it.
meanings.sent2: Soldiers patrolled the sturdy bawn day and night.
meanings.sent3: The squirrels used the bawn as a playground, climbing up and down.
meanings.sent4: The bawn shielded the fortress from enemy attacks.
meanings.sent5: The setting sun cast a golden light on the stone bawn.
